all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
For ye are the church of the Firstborn, and he will take you up in a cloud, and appoint every man his portion.
Doctrine and Covenants 78:21
Quote of the Day
"The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints is growing in members and families, missions and missionaries, meetinghouses and temples."
Elder Ronald A. Rasband | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
